About Me

Let me tell you few things ...

INTRO

My name is Azubuike Ikechukwu Stanley, I have 5 years experience in the use Adobe design Suite for still and motion graphics design and have being part of several design project over the last 5 years.
My focus is on user interface design and frontend languages(i.e Html, CSS, Javascripts and frontend frameworks) but am always curious to know how things work and it makes me take some courses on backend languages.
I Have done some User interface designs and I hope to be part of more projects in the future. When am not working with a client, I always enjoy getting to create and spend time on personal projects.
